[RequireComponent(typeof(AudioSource))] public class SubtitleContainer : MonoBehaviour Inheritance object Object Component Behaviour MonoBehaviour SubtitleContainer Fields autoPlay Play automatically on awake? public bool autoPlay Field Value bool subtitleData Subtitle Data to play public SubtitleData subtitleData Field Value SubtitleData Methods Play() Plays the attached Subtitle Data public void Play()

api/Gasimo.Subtitles.SubtitleData.html.keywords: Class SubtitleData Namespace Gasimo.Subtitles Assembly gasimo.subtitler.dll Contains data holding a single Closed Caption sequence. For individual lines, see SubtitleDataEntry. [CreateAssetMenu(fileName = "SubtitleFile", menuName = "Gasimo/SubtitleFile")] [Serializable] public class SubtitleData : ScriptableObject Inheritance object Object ScriptableObject SubtitleData Fields Subtitles Sequence of Subtitles [SerializeField] public SubtitleDataEntry[] Subtitles Field Value SubtitleDataEntry[]

api/Gasimo.Subtitles.SubtitleDataEntry.h.title: Class SubtitleDataEntry | Subtitler
api/Gasimo.Subtitles.SubtitleDataEntry.h.keywords: Class SubtitleDataEntry Namespace Gasimo.Subtitles Assembly gasimo.subtitler.dll Contains data for 1 line of dialogue. [Serializable] public class SubtitleDataEntry Inheritance object SubtitleDataEntry Fields audio AudioClip which will play simultaneously with the subtitle line. Can be left empty to not play sound. public AudioClip audio Field Value AudioClip dialogue Written Closed-Captions public string dialogue Field Value string displayFor How long will this subtitle be displayed for. public float displayFor Field Value float end public float end Field Value float speaker Display name of speaker/object which plays the dialogue. Leave empty for none (useful for sounds). [SerializeField] public string speaker Field Value string start public float start Field Value float subtitleEvent Programmable event which gets ivoked when this subtitle gets played. Useful to trigger mechanics exactly when player hears a certain line. public ScriptableEvent subtitleEvent Field Value ScriptableEvent waitFor Delay between last Subtitle line and this one. Leave 0 to play at same time as previous line. public float waitFor Field Value float

api/Gasimo.Subtitles.Subtitler.html.title: Class Subtitler | Subtitler
api/Gasimo.Subtitles.Subtitler.html.keywords: Class Subtitler Namespace Gasimo.Subtitles Assembly gasimo.subtitler.dll Subtitler Manager. Contains all display logic and cc functions. public class Subtitler : MonoSingleton<Subtitler> Inheritance object Object Component Behaviour MonoBehaviour MonoSingleton<Subtitler> Subtitler Inherited Members MonoSingleton<Subtitler>.Instance Fields centeredText Centers text. Text is aligned left by default. public bool centeredText Field Value bool displayPanel UI Panel GameObject where Subtitles will spawn public Transform displayPanel Field Value Transform enableBackgroundPanel Should background panel be visible? public bool enableBackgroundPanel Field Value bool player Target audioListener, used for audio occlusion calculation. public AudioListener player Field Value AudioListener speakerHighlight Default Speaker Color public Color speakerHighlight Field Value Color subtitlePool Pool of TextMeshProUGUI Instances. Initializes automatically. public ObjectPool<TextMeshProUGUI> subtitlePool Field Value ObjectPool<TextMeshProUGUI> subtitleSize Size of subtitle text. Default is 24. public int subtitleSize Field Value int Methods Awake() Use this for initialization. protected override void Awake() CheckHideSubtitlePanel() Checks whether the Subtitle Panel shouldnt be hidden. Hides it if no subtitles are currently on display. public UniTaskVoid CheckHideSubtitlePanel() Returns UniTaskVoid DisplaySubtitle(string, string, float) Method to display a single line of subtitles. Use this when you need to play subtitles using custom logic and want to skip all the additional features. public UniTaskVoid DisplaySubtitle(string message, string speaker, float displayFor) Parameters message string Message (Dialogue) line to show speaker string Name of object which said the line (Leave empty string for none) displayFor float How long should this line be displayed for? Returns UniTaskVoid killSubtitleById(int) Immediately kills an active subtitle loop based on ID public void killSubtitleById(int id) Parameters id int Subtitle Session ID to be killed playSubtitle(SubtitleData, AudioSource) Plays a given subtitle track public int playSubtitle(SubtitleData sD, AudioSource aS) Parameters sD SubtitleData Subtitle Data file aS AudioSource AudioSource to playOneShot through Returns int Cancellation ID of the subtitle instance

api/gasimo.subtitles.ScriptableEvent.htm.title: Class ScriptableEvent | Subtitler
api/gasimo.subtitles.ScriptableEvent.htm.keywords: Class ScriptableEvent Namespace Gasimo.Subtitles Assembly gasimo.subtitler.dll Object which you can bind custom events to. Use it by creating an ScriptableObject for every instance of events you want to use. To subscribe, use onEventRaised. To raise, use Raise(). Subtitles automatically calls Raise() when you attach instance of this class to a Subtitle line. [CreateAssetMenu(fileName = "ScriptableEvent", menuName = "Gasimo/ScriptableEvent")] [Serializable] public class ScriptableEvent : ScriptableObject Inheritance object Object ScriptableObject ScriptableEvent Methods Raise() Invokes events subscribed to onEventRaised. public void Raise() Events onEventRaised public event ScriptableEvent.ScriptableEventHandler onEventRaised Event Type ScriptableEvent.ScriptableEventHandler

api/gasimo.subtitles.html.keywords: Namespace Gasimo.Subtitles Classes MonoSingleton<T> Helper class to implement Singleton pattern into Subtitler ScriptableEvent Object which you can bind custom events to. Use it by creating an ScriptableObject for every instance of events you want to use. To subscribe, use onEventRaised. To raise, use Raise(). Subtitles automatically calls Raise() when you attach instance of this class to a Subtitle line. SubtitleContainer Component representing one subtitle source in the world. SubtitleData Contains data holding a single Closed Caption sequence. For individual lines, see SubtitleDataEntry. SubtitleDataEntry Contains data for 1 line of dialogue. Subtitler Subtitler Manager.
